description:
godoc: Extract first sentences for the package index better

Also, remove a long, ugly URL that any decent search engine can find
by searching on the title of the document.

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Probably the firstSentence implementation in cmd/go
should be lifted and reused here.  I think it does a better
job, and they should be consistent anyway.

Also, please put the URL back.
It's there precisely because finding the doc was difficult for me.

// sentence
package macho

// URL

is fine.

subject: code review 5578046: godoc: Extract first sentences for the package index better
